entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Scott
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
